Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/drm2/dist/drm/nouveau/include/nvkm/subdev/vga.h

1/* $NetBSD: vga.h,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:30 riastradh Exp $ */
2
3#ifndef __NOUVEAU_VGA_H__
4#define __NOUVEAU_VGA_H__
5#include <core/subdev.h>
6
7/* access to various legacy io ports */
8u8 nvkm_rdport(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u16 port);
9void nvkm_wrport(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u16 port, u8 value);
10
11/* VGA Sequencer */
12u8 nvkm_rdvgas(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u8 index);
13void nvkm_wrvgas(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u8 index, u8 value);
14
15/* VGA Graphics */
16u8 nvkm_rdvgag(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u8 index);
17void nvkm_wrvgag(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u8 index, u8 value);
18
19/* VGA CRTC */
20u8 nvkm_rdvgac(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u8 index);
21void nvkm_wrvgac(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u8 index, u8 value);
22
23/* VGA indexed port access dispatcher */
24u8 nvkm_rdvgai(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u16 port, u8 index);
25void nvkm_wrvgai(struct nvkm_device *, int head, u16 port, u8 index, u8 value);
26
27bool nvkm_lockvgac(struct nvkm_device *, bool lock);
28u8 nvkm_rdvgaowner(struct nvkm_device *);
29void nvkm_wrvgaowner(struct nvkm_device *, u8);
30#endif
31
